title: IAA Tonight | Should Phoenix Suns Governor Robert Sarver Be Forced to Sell the Team?
description: More fallout from Suns Governor Robert Sarver continues as sponsors have now threatened to seperate themselves from the franchise if he's still in charge. Brandon Marshall, Auntie Chantel Tremetiere and Ashley Nicole Moss dive further into the matter. Plus, former NFL All-Pro and Football Analyst Chad Brown joins to discuss the Steelers, Seahawks and more!
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Brandon Marshall, Ashley Nicole Moss, Chantel Tremetiere)
